We're proud to work with Seda to bring decentralized data infrastructure to
Caldera chains!

SEDA

536 followers

3mo

We are integrating with Caldera to bring our decentralized data infrastructure
to their cutting-edge rollup technology🔥. Caldera allows developers to build
custom high-performance rollup chains called Caldera Chains, optimized for
their specific dApp's needs. Leveraging SEDA, Caldera will be able to securely
access essential off-chain data in a decentralized manner 🌐.

Hi friends! Caldera is aggressively hiring engineers across the stack (React,
Typescript, Go, Solidity) to help us accelerate our engineering velocity We're
a blockchain infrastructure company helping dapps scale by launching dedicated
L2 blockchains. We've received funding from legendary silicon valley VCs
including Neo and Sequoia Capital, and top crypto investors like Dragonfly,
1kx, Ethereal Ventures, AllianceDAO, and more. We're working on cutting-edge
modular blockchain tech and are one of a few seed-stage crypto companies in
2023 that's actually making money 🤑 Open job postings: - Software Engineer,
Product (https://lnkd.in/gpX2kp_B) - Software Engineer, Systems
(https://lnkd.in/g5Puuh9T Not looking right now? We've opened up a public
referral program \-- if you refer an engineer we end up hiring, we'll give you
$10k: https://lnkd.in/giN5_Dzd
